title: Preparing your child for school
creator_credit: Victoria. Ministry of Education, Trevor Lunn, Glen Iver and Jeff Spencer
brief_description: The start of a child’s schooling should set a positive tone for the rest of school life. This program looks at some common issues relevant to children about to start school and aims to put both the new pupil and the parent at ease.
creator_credit_for_label: Victoria. Ministry of Education, Trevor Lunn, Glen Iver and Jeff Spencer
